General.Name: Usak Seramik Sanayi AS
General.Description: Usak Seramik Sanayi A.S. engages in the production and sale of ceramics in Turkey, the United States, Germany, Italy, Canada, and internationally. It offers ceramic wall, floor, and granite tiles, as well as kerb, decor, and porcelain products. The company was formerly known as Usak Elektro Porselen Sanayi A.S and changed its name to Usak Seramik Sanayi A.S. in 1986. Usak Seramik Sanayi A.S. was founded in 1972 and is based in Banaz, Turkey.
General.Address: Dilek Mahallesi Degirmenler Sokak No:100, Banaz, Turkey, 64500
